Name: rs-type²
Purpose: See note. Involves 2 Integer Registers and a Small immediate (1-16)

Name: fs-type²
Purpose: See note. Involves 2 Floating Point Registers and a Small immediate (1-16)

Name: rm-type¹
Encoding: 110o oooo occc crrr | iiii iiii iiii iiii
Purpose: See note. 1 or 2 Registers with large immediate, possibly with addressing mode

Name: fm-type¹
Encoding: 111o oooo occc crrr | iiii iiii iiii iiii
Purpose: See note. 1 or 2 Registers with large immediate, possibly with addressing mode
